overview: Imagine you are a writer of erotic movies. You can turn your thoughts into hot action. Anything you want to happen will happen ... No fantasy is out of reach ... With this in mind, watch as a writer and a producer, while dining in a crowded restaurant, make their erotic dreams come to life simply by talking about what they want to see. From making love in a car on a deserted, dusty road, to doing it in the restaurant itself. It all happens by just thinking of it. This film features talented newcomers and big name stars. Sit back and find out what really goes on BEHIND BLUE EYES.
tagline: The Most erotic and raunchiest sex your mind can dream up!
title: Behind Blue Eyes
